BibleStudyGui::SearchResultsModel

BibleStudyGui::SearchResultsModel Class Reference

This class is an implementation of a model from the Qt Model/View framework for a table view which displays the results of a search. More...

#include <SearchResultsModel.h>

  translation_column = 0, book_column = 1, chapter_column = 2, verse_column = 3,
  text_column = 4

int columnCount (const QModelIndex &parent=QModelIndex()) const

Detailed Description

This class is an implementation of a model from the Qt Model/View framework for a table view which displays the results of a search.
